BrainWorkup Neuropsychology

Joey Trampush, Ph.D.

BrainWorkup Neuropsychology

Led by Dr. Joey Trampush, USC Keck School of Medicine faculty member, we provide expert neuropsychological evaluations in Marina Del Rey, serving all of Southern California.

Our Focus: - Comprehensive diagnostic testing for ADHD, autism, learning disabilities, and cognitive concerns - Evidence-based assessment protocols with clear, actionable recommendations - Detailed reports that help you advocate for needed services and accommodations

Important: We are a diagnostic assessment center onlyâ€”not a therapy provider. Evaluations typically require 4-8 hours across multiple sessions.

Schedule your evaluation: (213) 495-1155 | Schedule Online

Our Services

ADHD Assessment

  • Comprehensive testing beyond basic questionnaires
  • Measures attention patterns and executive functioning
  • Clear diagnosis and practical recommendations
  • Ages 5 through adult
  • Learn more â†’

Autism Evaluation

  • Evidence-based diagnostic protocols
  • Assessment of social communication and sensory processing
  • Experience with subtle and complex presentations
  • Documentation for school and Regional Center services
  • Learn more â†’

Learning Disability Testing

  • Identification of dyslexia, dyscalculia, and processing disorders
  • Detailed analysis of academic and cognitive skills
  • Recommendations for IEP/504 plans and accommodations
  • Learn more â†’

Testing Accommodations

  • Documentation for SAT, ACT, LSAT, MCAT, GRE
  • Reports meeting strict testing agency requirements
  • College disability services documentation
  • Learn more â†’

Our Data-Driven Approach

We transform complex assessment data into clear, actionable insights using:

  • Advanced statistical analysis and pattern detection
  • Custom visualizations that make cognitive profiles easy to understand
  • Translation of technical findings into practical recommendations

This approach enables more precise diagnosis and more effective, personalized interventions.
